original_text: Say now to the rebellious house, Know ye not what these things mean? tell them, Behold, the king of Babylon is come to Jerusalem, and hath taken the king thereof, and the princes thereof, and led them with him to Babylon;
korean_text: 너는 반역하는 족속에게 묻기를 너희가 이 비유를 깨닫지 못하겠느냐 하고 그들에게 말하기를 바벨론 왕이 예루살렘에 이르러 왕과 고관을 사로잡아 바벨론 자기에게로 끌어 가고

sentences.original_text: Say now to the rebellious house,
Know ye not what these things mean?
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 이것들이 무엇을 의미하는지 알지 못하느냐?

sentences.original_text: Behold, the king of Babylon is come to Jerusalem,
and hath taken the king thereof,
and led them with him to Babylon;
